title: Blue

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While your target is not notified of the effects, anyone who visits them will.
Color Combinations:
- Blue and Red (3575) makes Purple (3578).
- Blue and Yellow (3576) makes Green (3580).
- Blue and Black makes Navy Blue (3585).
- Blue and White makes Baby Blue (3586).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!

desc:
Post 3577
Unstoppable/None
- As a Primary color, Blue can Color a player to turn them into a Color, as long as an Achromatic or other Primary Color is also selecting to Color the same player.
- Blue symbolizes calmness, peacefulness, and sadness. Blue can visit a player to fill them with sadness, making them die the next night, but also calm them, making their night ability fail tonight and the following night, and be unable to vote the next day.
